snippet.title: Logan Kart 8 Classic: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY NOW AT:
https://gamejolt.com/games/lk8c/345887

9064 proudly presents Logan Kart 8! (v0.07)

A Mario Kart fan-game with a bunch of random stuff thrown in, Logan Kart 8 aims to capture the experience of the most famous kart-racing game series, but on the PC. Built from the ground up to provide exciting gameplay, Logan Kart offers a lot of content in a fast-paced, action-packed racing adventure.


FEATURES:

- Frustratingly comical physics
- Eight different characters - some never-before-seen, some borderlining on copyright infringement
- Six different karts, ranging from ridiculous to absurd
- Seven different tracks, each offering its own challenge and environment (More tracks will be continually added until completion)
- A variety of familiar items from the Mario Kart series for chaotic races, plus the all-new dreaded "Golden Blue Shell"
- Six race classes to master, from beginner speed up to uncontrollably fast
- Grand prix and time trials modes for single-player action
- VS Mode for one to four players with full-feature splitscreen multiplayer
- Support for two people using the same keyboard and up to four different joysticks or gamepads
- Somewhat "original" soundtrack
- Bugs and glitches just waiting to be discovered


The game is currently under active development, with an estimated completion date sometime in 2015.

2015 - 9064
